title: Me too! Me too!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Come on, Maki-chan, pl-e-a-se-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>No<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let me do it! Please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re not going to do anything. Why do you want to mess with people’s hair so bad? I don’t get it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Because Rin-chan and Hanayo-chan said that “Maki-chan’s hair is really smooth”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>*Sigh*.... Not really, it’s just normal. Besides, if you want to mess with hairs, wouldn’t someone with long hair be better?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hey, I’ve tied Yukiho’s hair before, so I’m pretty good at it, you know? I want to try braiding your hair, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….No way<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m not gonna move from here until you let me do it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….Geeeeeez! Rin, Hanayo, and now Honoka, why does everyone want to touch other people’s hair! 10 minutes is all I’m giving you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
